message.body: Lauren! I just realized that I've hardly talked to you all summer! And that is just unacceptable! How're you doing?
you're right, that is unacceptable! i'm just about to hop in the shower, though, i'll text you in a bit!
anyway, i've been really good, though i'm getting to the point in the summer where i want to go back to school. how are youuu?

Lol, yo dawg, if you already want to go back to school, that just means you aren't finding enough to do in Summerville! Fix that, have fun! I'm good too, just trying to amp myself up since I have to work at 7am tomorrow :o
you're probably right! and it looks like we're both having early mornings, i've been doing this pet-sitting thing and the morning stuff has to happen at like 7:30. :/
Oh man, solidarity, poor us :( How long will you be doing the house-sitting thing? I get off work at 2 tomorrow, we should hang out later in the day.
maybe! i'm supposed to have dinner with my parents so i'll have to see when that's supposed to happen.
Coolcool, if you're busy it's all good. I just thought I'd offer to keep you entertained while you're in Summerville :)
thanks. we should hang out soon, though!
Yes, it's been far too long, think of all the good times we've missed, not hanging out!
